content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. Remember, it's all about weighing the pros and cons and making an informed decision based on your needs and budget. If you're comfortable with the potential drawbacks, a certified refurbished or open-box WH-1000XM4 could be a great way to save some money.

If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask. Otherwise, good luck with your headphone hunt, and I hope you find the perfect pair at a price that fits your budget!

(And don't forget to enjoy your new Samsung Galaxy Watch Active!)
